title: Uh, riot, explain?

embed.description: ALL REGIONS] We're seeing a high amount of disconnects related to the error image below. Teams are aware and investigating now.

body: My account has leaver status because of this issue, because my game crashes literally EVERY GAME once it hits late game and it won't let me reconnect. This twitter post frustrates me not only because they didn't put it as an actual client notification, or because of the fact that this is an issue that's almost a month old. No this frustrates me because this is proof that riot KNOWS why I'm disconnecting from the game and I'm STILL getting leaver status. RIOT I need an answer other than "don't play the game until it's fixed" on the same week that ARURF is on. This is a month old issue, FIX IT FIRST BEFORE ANYTHING ELSE.
